description:
Our reputable attorneys at Karlin, Fleisher & Falkenberg, LLC, have a proven history of winning personal injury cases on behalf of people like you. From our Chicago, Illinois, law office, we represent clients throughout Cook County. The verdicts and settlements we have obtained on behalf of clients total more than $400 million. We know how to demonstrate negligence, outline your losses and ensure that the people responsible for your injuries are held accountable.

 

We have an extensive practice that covers automobile accidents involving trucks, motorcycles and cars. Our law office also handles matters, such as medical malpractice, birth injuries, dangerous drugs, nursing home litigation, premises liability, dangerous products and wrongful death. In one construction litigation case, our team secured $17.2 million for a man who was rendered a paraplegic following an accident. We also recovered a $6.2 million settlement when medical professionals failed to deliver an infant in a timely fashion, resulting in cerebral palsy.

 

Members of our law office have earned the highest peer rating possible of AV Preeminent* from Martindale-Hubbell for their dedication to legal ethics and their superior skills. We apply this combination in every case we handle, so you can be rest assured that we are always looking out for your interests. To serve you better, Karlin, Fleisher & Falkenberg, LLC, offers free initial consultations and can accept credit cards.

 

 

* AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review Rating™ fall into two categories – legal ability and general ethical standards.
